daily.description: IG account ID in Facebook Business Manager.
daily.name: account_id

daily.description: Number of taps on the email link in the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: email_contacts

daily.description: Number of new followers each day. Not available on IG Users with fewer than 100 followers.
daily.name: follower_count

daily.description: Number of taps on the directions link in the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: get_directions_clicks

daily.description: Number of times the IG User's IG Media objects (i.e. posts, stories and promotions) have been viewed each day. Does not include profile views.
daily.name: impressions

daily.description: Number of taps on the call link in the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: phone_call_clicks

daily.description: Number of users who have viewed the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: profile_views

daily.description: Number of unique users who have viewed at least one of the IG User's IG Media each day.
daily.name: reach

daily.description: Number of taps on the text message link in the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: text_message_clicks

daily.description: Number of taps on the website link in the IG User's profile each day.
daily.name: website_clicks

lifetime.description: IG account ID in Facebook Business Manager.
lifetime.name: account_id

lifetime.description: Biography displayed at IG User profile.
lifetime.name: biography

lifetime.description: Name displayed at IG User profile.
lifetime.name: name

lifetime.description: Path to IG User profile picture.
lifetime.name: profile_picture_url

lifetime.description: Total number of IG accounts the User follows.
lifetime.name: follows_count

lifetime.description: The cities of the IG User's followers. Not available on IG Users with fewer than 100 followers.
lifetime.name: audience_city

lifetime.description: The countries of the IG User's followers. Not available on IG Users with fewer than 100 followers.
lifetime.name: audience_country

lifetime.description: The gender and age distribution of the IG User's followers. Not available on IG Users with fewer than 100 followers.
lifetime.name: audience_gender_age

lifetime.description: The locales by country codes of the IG User's followers. Not available on IG Users with fewer than 100 followers.
lifetime.name: audience_locale

post.description: ISO 8601 formatted creation date in UTC.
post.name: created_date

post.description: Username of user who created the media.
post.name: username

post.description: Media URL. Will be omitted from responses if the media contains copyrighted material, or has been flagged for a copyright violation.
post.name: media_url

post.description: Media type. Can be CAROUSEL_ALBUM, IMAGE, or VIDEO.
post.name: media_type

post.description: Surface where the media is published. Can be AD, FEED, IGTV, or STORY.
post.name: media_product_type

post.description: Media thumbnail URL. Only available on VIDEO media.
post.name: thumbnail_url

post.description: Indicates if comments are enabled or disabled.
post.name: is_comment_enabled

post.description: Count of likes on the media.
post.name: like_count

post.description: Count of comments on the media.
post.name: comments_count

post.description: Sum of likes_count, comment_count and saved counts on the IG Media.
post.name: engagement

post.description: Total number of times the IG Media object has been seen.
post.name: impressions

post.description: Total number of unique Instagram accounts that have seen the IG Media object.
post.name: reach

post.description: Total number of unique Instagram accounts that have saved the IG Media object.
post.name: saved

post.description: Total number of times the video IG Media has been seen. For album IG Media, the number of times all videos within the album have been seen.
post.name: video_views

story.description: ISO 8601 formatted creation date in UTC.
story.name: timestamp

story.description: Username of user who created the media.
story.name: username

story.description: Media URL. Will be omitted from responses if the media contains copyrighted material, or has been flagged for a copyright violation.
story.name: media_url

story.description: Media type. Can be CAROUSEL_ALBUM, IMAGE, or VIDEO.
story.name: media_type

story.description: Surface where the media is published. Can be AD, FEED, IGTV, or STORY.
story.name: media_product_type

story.description: Indicates if comments are enabled or disabled.
story.name: is_comment_enabled

story.description: Count of likes on the media.
story.name: like_count

story.description: Count of comments on the media.
story.name: comments_count

story.description: Number of times someone exited the story IG Media object.
story.name: exits

story.description: Total number of times the story IG Media object has been seen.
story.name: impressions

story.description: Total number of unique Instagram accounts that have seen the story IG Media object.
story.name: reach

story.description: Total number of replies (IG Comments) on the story IG Media object.
story.name: replies

story.description: Total number of taps to see this story IG Media object's next photo or video.
story.name: taps_forward

story.description: Total number of taps to see this story IG Media object's previous photo or video.
story.name: taps_back

reels.description: Caption. @ symbol excluded.
reels.name: caption

reels.description: Count of likes on the media.
reels.name: like_count

reels.description: Media URL. Will be omitted from responses if the media contains copyrighted material, or has been flagged for a copyright violation.
reels.name: media_url

reels.description: Media type. Can be CAROUSEL_ALBUM, IMAGE, or VIDEO.
reels.name: media_type

reels.description: Surface where the media is published. Can be AD, FEED, IGTV, or STORY.
reels.name: media_product_type

reels.description: Count of comments on the media.
reels.name: comments_count

reels.description: Permanent URL to the media.
reels.name: permalink

reels.description: IG Media ID.
reels.name: ig_id

reels.description: Indicates if comments are enabled or disabled.
reels.name: is_comment_enabled

reels.description: Media thumbnail URL. Only available on VIDEO media.
reels.name: thumbnail_url

reels.description: Username of user who created the media.
reels.name: username

reels.description: Media ID.
reels.name: id

reels.description: Number of comments on the reel. Metric in development.
reels.name: comments

reels.description: Number of likes on the reel. Metric in development.
reels.name: likes

reels.description: Number of times the reels starts to play after an impression is already counted. This is defined as video sessions with 1 ms or more of playback and excludes replays. Metric in development.
reels.name: plays

reels.description: Number of unique accounts that have seen the reel at least once. Reach is different from impressions, which can include multiple views of a reel by the same account. Metric is estimated and in development.
reels.name: reach

reels.description: Number of saves of the reel. Metric in development.
reels.name: saved

reels.description: Number of shares of the reel. Metric in development.
reels.name: shares

reels.description: Number of likes, saves, comments, and shares on the reel, minus the number of unlikes, unsaves, and deleted comments. Metric in development.
reels.name: total_interactions

reels.description: ISO 8601 formatted creation date in UTC.
reels.name: created_date
